title: Chance
description: Three Brothers. One mating ritual. Equals one wild, sexy night...  Chance Hawthorne only knew one thing in life...mating wasn't for him. He might be forced to endure the bloody ritual, but that didn't mean he had any plans to settle down and make baby grizzilies.  Until the day he meets Rowana Crow and all bets are off. He wants more than just her body for one night of fun, he plans to make the woman his future, the only problem now is convincing her that she wants him too...
author: Selene Charles
